com.csvanefalk.keytestgen.backend.xml
Class XMLConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.csvanefalk.keytestgen.backend.xml.XMLHandler
      com.csvanefalk.keytestgen.backend.xml.XMLConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFrameworkConverter
public class XMLConverter
extends XMLHandler
implements IFrameworkConverter

Provides functionality for turning a set of TestCase instances into a corresponding XML representation. This XML constitutes the default output produced by KeYTestGen2, and can be parsed by instances of ITestCaseParser in order to generate more specific test suites.

Author:
christopher

Field Detail

eventFactory

private static final javax.xml.stream.XMLEventFactory eventFactory
The eventFactory is used in order to produce XMLEvents, that is, XML tags.

newline

private static final javax.xml.stream.events.XMLEvent newline
XMLEvent representing a newline.

SEPARATOR

private static final java.lang.String SEPARATOR

tab

private static final javax.xml.stream.events.XMLEvent tab
XMLEvent representing a tab.

eventWriter

private final javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter eventWriter
The eventWriter is used to add new XMLEvents to the outputStream. These events, in turn, are created by the eventFactory.

format

private boolean format
Flag to determine if the XML should be formatted or not.

indentationCounter

private int indentationCounter
count the number of indentation tags that should be added before each element in the document.

outputStream

private final java.io.OutputStream outputStream
The outputStream acts as a buffer for generated XML tags. its content can later be encoded to some other representation, such as a String or File.

Constructor Detail

XMLConverter

public XMLConverter()
             throws XMLGeneratorException
Sets up the XML visitor, initializing the XMLEventWriter in the process.

Parameters:
rootTag - the name of the root tag of the resulting XML document. If this parameter is null or empty, no root tag will be generated for the document.
Throws:
XMLGeneratorException
XMLVisitorException - in the event that the event writer could not be set up

createTestSuite

public java.lang.String createTestSuite(java.util.List<TestCase> testCases,
                                        boolean format)
                                 throws XMLGeneratorException
Create a complete test suite from a set of TestCase instances, encoded in KeYTestGens native XML format.

Parameters:
testCases - the testcases to include in the test suite
format - add formatting and indentation to the output document?
Returns:
an XML representation of the test suite
Throws:
XMLGeneratorException - if XML generation failed

writeFixture

private void writeFixture(Model model)
                   throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
Converts a Model instance to KeYTestgens native XML format. In the context of the test case itself, this represents the test fixture, or program state prior to the execution of the method.

Parameters:
model - the model to convert
Throws:
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - in case the XML could not be generated
